title: A  Double-Blind, Active-Controlled  Study of HTN-295 (ACE inhibitor) in Patients With Spinal Muscular Atrophy
officialTitle: A  Double-Blind, Active-Controlled  Study of HTN-295 (ACE inhibitor) in Patients With Spinal Muscular Atrophy
description: This is a  double-blind, active-controlled  study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of HTN-295 (ACE inhibitor) in patients with Spinal Muscular Atrophy. The study will enroll approximately 92 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 24-74 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Spinal Muscular Atrophy
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
